name: Space Walk (evan12811)
description:
--Controls--

Hold down "Mouse 1" to aim; release to launch

"R" to restart level

"Esc" to return to the main menu

--How to play--

Launch the astronaut into each planet's orbit. Once the astronaut has spent enough time in each planet's orbit, return the astronaut to the space station to complete the level.

The astronaut can be launched 3 times before running out of energy. Entering a planet's orbit refills the astronaut's energy.
